description: Main entry point for a Flutter application that sets up theme, routing, state management, and primary UI scaffold with bottom navigation.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the Flutter app, setting up providers, theme, routing, and initial screen.

classes.name: RootScaffold
classes.description: Stateful widget that forms the main scaffold with bottom navigation; contains tabs for Home, Search, and Favorites.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point that runs the MyApp widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for MyApp, setting up MultiProvider and MaterialApp.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for RootScaffold.

methods.name: _RootScaffoldState.build
methods.description: Builds the scaffold with AppBar, IndexedStack for pages, and BottomNavigationBar for navigation.
